title: Carsforsale.com Receives SHRM 2015 Workplace Excellence Award
text:
Carsforsale.com
The Sioux Empire Society for Human Resource Management has honored Carsforsale.com with the 2015 Workplace Excellence Award.
SIOUX FALLS, S.D. , Oct. 16, Carsforsale.com , headquartered in Sioux Falls, SD , has been recognized by the Sioux Empire Society for Human Resource Management with the 2015 Workplace Excellence Award in the medium-sized business category. Carsforsale.com was honored at a luncheon on October 14, 2015 at the Sioux Falls Convention Center. The award application was based on the culture, philosophy, and community involvement fostered in each nominated business's work environment.
According to the SESHRM organization website, this prestigious annual Workplace Excellence Award is to acknowledge those companies that have made significant strides in employee practices to establish a highly desirable work environment and to recognize them for their leadership, culture and best practices. These companies are family-friendly with a dedicated workforce consistently portraying a strong culture of empowerment and growth.
"I am proud to work for a company that supports its employees and community that we live in," said Dawn Uthe , Human Resource Director at Carsforsale.com. "It is an honor to be recognized for the fun, comfortable culture that we have. Not only do we have a great group of leaders here, we have an employee base that helps create and maintain our 'Work Hard, Play Hard' culture."
With 200 employees in Sales, Dealer Relations, Graphics, Software Development & IT, Operations and Product Innovation, Carsforsale.com offers their dealer network of over 20,000 dealerships nationwide a full suite of marketing solutions including dealer websites, inventory and lead management, and reporting. The company also provides consumers with a search engine to search for new and used vehicles with their inventory website.
Carsforsale.com promotes accountability and trust, open and clear communication, and collaboration and team work. The business and staff support programs that positively impact local and global needs, with financial support and volunteer efforts to many charitable organizations.
For more information on Carsforsale.com career opportunities or to apply, visit www.Carsforsale.com/careers.
